title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 31, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of the poet who said, "A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness"––John Keats.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the poet who said, "A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness"––John Keats.
